ground_truth.thought: 获取主播在直播过程中如何保护用户隐私
ground_truth.name: LiveStreamingPlatform.get_broadcaster_privacy_practices

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_privacy_policy', 'description': 'Get the privacy policy of a live streaming platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'privacy_policy', 'description': 'the privacy policy of the platform'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_broadcaster_privacy_practices', 'description': 'Get the privacy practices of a broadcaster on a live streaming platform.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'broadcaster_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the broadcaster'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'privacy_practices', 'description': 'the privacy practices of the broadcaster'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_audience_privacy_awareness', 'description': 'Get the data on how much the audience values privacy protection during live streaming.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'privacy_awareness', 'description': 'the level of privacy awareness among the audience'}]}, {'name': 'LiveStreamingPlatform.get_privacy_protection_recommendations', 'description': 'Get recommendations on how to protect user privacy during live streaming.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'platform_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the live streaming platform.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'recommendations for privacy protection'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解直播经济中的用户隐私保护。首先，请获取直播平台的用户隐私政策。然后，获取主播在直播过程中如何保护用户隐私。接着，获取观众对隐私保护的重视程度数据。最后，基于这些信息，为我提供一些关于如何在直播中保护用户隐私的建议。
获取直播平台的用户隐私政策
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'platform_name'的值是什么?
{'privacy_policy': 'The privacy policy of example_platform includes the following: ...'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'privacy_policy': 'The privacy policy of example_platform includes the following: ...'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 获取主播在直播过程中如何保护用户隐私的实践。
